001package org.example;
002
003import java.io.BufferedReader;
004import java.io.FileReader;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.util.InputMismatchException;
007import java.util.Locale;
008import java.util.Scanner;
009
010public class TestArray {
011
012
013  //Arrays
014  String[] currency = new String[39];
015  String[] wert = new String[39];
016  static String[] filterTest = new String[39];
017
018  public void arrayfuellen() throws IOException {
019
020
021    //path to the .txt file
022
023    //reading only the first line
024    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("SDR.txt"));
025
026
027    //Variables for the arrays
028    int i = 0;
029    int a = 0;
030    int x = 0;
031    int z = 0;
032
033    //filling the arrays with currency names and SDR-Value
034    while (i < 78) {
035      if (a % 2 == 0) {
036        currency[x] = br.readLine().toUpperCase();
037        x++;
038      } else {
039        wert[z] = br.readLine().toUpperCase();
040        z++;
041      }
042      a++;
043      i++;
044    }
045  }
046
047  public static void filter(String[] currency, String eingabe) {
048
049    TestArray arrayausgabe = new TestArray();
050    Start startui = new Start();
051
052    Filter filter = new Filter();
053
054     filterTest = Filter.filterArray(currency, eingabe);
055
056
057    int i = 0;
058    for (String output : filterTest
059    ) {
060      System.out.println(i + ": " + output);
061      i++;
062    }
063
064  }
065
066    private double round(double value, int decimalPoints){
067    double d =Math.pow(10,decimalPoints);
068    return Math.round(value*d)/d;
069    }
070
071    private String prepareDouble(String wert){
072    StringBuffer buf = new StringBuffer(wert);
073    for (int i =0;i<buf.length();i++){
074      if(wert.charAt(i)==','){
075        buf.setCharAt(i,'.');
076      }else if(wert.charAt(i)=='.'){
077        buf.deleteCharAt(i);
078      }
079    }
080    String output= buf.toString();
081    return output;
082    }
083
084
085    public void filtered() {
086      // Persönliches check up. Vor Abgabe Löschen
087      Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
088      Start start = new Start();
089      TestArray arrayausgabe = new TestArray();
090      Start startui = new Start();
091
092
093      String eingabe = scanner.next();
094      String buy = "";
095      String sell = "";
096      while (!eingabe.equals("x")) {
097
098try {
099
100
101  if (eingabe.equals("0")) {
102
103    System.out.println("Please enter the currencys name: ");
104    String currencyEingabe = scanner.next().toUpperCase();
105
106    filter(currency, currencyEingabe);
107
108    System.out.println("Select a currency by index: ");
109    int eingabeInt = scanner.nextInt();
110
111    start.setToBuy(filterTest[eingabeInt]);
112    start.toString();
113    start.startupInterface(0);
114    eingabe = "";
115
116  } else if (eingabe.equals("1")) {
117
118    System.out.println("Please enter the currencys name: ");
119    String currencyEingabe = scanner.next().toUpperCase();
120
121    filter(currency, currencyEingabe);
122
123    System.out.println("Select a currency by index: ");
124    int eingabeInt = scanner.nextInt();
125
126
127    start.setToSell(filterTest[eingabeInt]);
128    start.toString();
129    start.startupInterface(1);
130    eingabe = "";
131
132  } else if (eingabe.equals("2")) {
133
134    System.out.println("Enter an amount:");
135    double eingabeD = scanner.nextDouble();
136    double ausgabe = round(eingabeD, 2);
137
138
139    for (int i = 0; i < currency.length; i++) {
140      if (start.getToBuy().equals(currency[i])) {
141        buy = prepareDouble(wert[i]);
142        System.out.println(wert[i]);
143      }
144      if (start.getToSell().equals(currency[i])) {
145        sell = prepareDouble(wert[i]);
146      }
147    }
148
149    double buyD = round(Double.parseDouble(buy), 2);
150    double sellD = round(Double.parseDouble(sell), 2);
151    String setToBuy = start.getToBuy() + ": " + ausgabe;
152    start.setToBuy(setToBuy);
153    ausgabe = ausgabe / buyD;
154    ausgabe *= sellD;
155    // System.out.println(ausgabe);
156    String setToSell = start.getToSell() + ": " + round(ausgabe, 2);
157    start.setToSell(setToSell);
158
159    start.toStringEnd();
160    start.startupInterface(2);
161
162  } else {
163
164  }
165}catch (InputMismatchException e) {
166  System.out.println("Please enter only the latin alphabet");
167  continue;
168}
169catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e){
170  System.out.println("Please enter only the given index");
171  start.startupInterface(0);
172  continue;
173}
174
175
176      eingabe = scanner.next();
177
178
179      }
180    }
181
182
183
184}
